London ISD has hired a new Police Chief. Officer Steven Thompson comes to London ISD after spending the past two years at Santa Gertrudis ISD. Officer Thompson has over 22 years of law enforcement experience spending most of his time in the Kansas City area. He is currently a member of the Kleberg County Sheriff's department. He also spent 8 years in the Army National Guard. Some of his roles include, Team Officer, Motorcycle Officer, Liaison from the Police Department to the school district in their Active Shooter. He is married with three children.

Officer Thompson will begin his first day with London ISD on Monday, February 17, 2020.
